nodes.label: message
nodes.text: I have not rec'd email message from blood testing lab, but Person1 has MM/DD/YYYY with Dr. Person2 MM/DD/YYYY to discuss revised radio-surgery plan. He will stop by your office afterward. Does Dr. Person3 want Person1 to continue on Meloxicam 15mg tabs?
